actions.Multiattack: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.Lightning Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The dragon exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
